outline:
1. to stoop, bend, incline
    1. (Qal)
      1. to stoop, bend
      2. to incline, tip
    2. (Piel) to tip over
strongs_def: to tip over (for the purpose of spilling or pouring out), i.e. (figuratively) depopulate; by implication, to imprison or conquer; (reflexive) to lie down (for coitus)
